transingTip.basic: In use {{server}} Translation in progress……Please wait.
transingTip.openai:
ChatGPT translation in progress……Please wait

Configuration of the application： {{openai_name}}
transingTip.openai_isStream: Current stream transfer is not enabled. You will have to wait a long time before you can see the result, please be patient.

error.basic:
Please try again or replace the translation interface.

Tap the Debug icon in the top right toolbar to see more information
error.unexpected:
**:( Translation encountered problem：** unexpected error

Please try again or replace the translation interface
error.youdao413:
413 Request Entity Too Large

Text length exceeds the limit of the channel translation interface, please replace other translation interfaces
error.deepl429:
Requests are too frequent, please try again later and try again

that is usually due to frequent translations within a short time, or to a one-time translation of more than 5,000 characters.

DeepL limits the number and frequency of translations,

this is temporary, returning to normal after some time
error.GMRequest: **:( Translation encountered a problem：** error while retrieving data from the interface
error.processer:
**:( There was a problem with the translation：** There was an error getting the target data 

There may be an error in the response data.
error.checkResponse: **:( Translation encountered a problem：** unexpected error while checking for response data

chatgpt_prompt.common: Please translate the following text to{{transTargetLang}}, which is part of the description of a programming contest question, pay attention to the translation of the terminology, be careful to keep the LaTeX formulas in it untranslated, you only need to reply to the translated content, do not reply to anything else：
chatgpt_prompt.notLaTeX: Please translate the following text to{{transTargetLang}}, which is part of the description of a programming contest question, pay attention to the translation of terminology, and be careful to keep the [ ], the HTML tags themselves, and the content therein untranslated and unchanged, you only need to reply to the translated content, and do not reply to anything else：
